column5: Private bedroom upstairs in our new house. The room features a queen sized bed and a twin sized bed, TV with Netflix, a desk and a full bathroom. There is also a mini fridge, microwave and a water cooler in the room for your private use.  Our house is in the city of Manor, just outside of the Austin City Limits. We are a 15-20 minute drive to any part of Austin (downtown, airport, COTA, Round Rock, etc.) with easy access to downtown via the 290. We live in a very safe and quiet neighborhood.
column8: Clean Bedroom and Bath Near Austin City Limit
